document_name: Decree establishing the powers of the national Renewable Energy Agency
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/TUN/2004/TUN-2004-04-26-Decree establishing the powers of the national Renewable Energy Agency_526aed7109e16b2d0e048609f0900950.pdf
document_description: The Agency's responsibilities include mitigation of GHG emissions and developing a GHG inventory.
